name: GitHub Mobile 2FA Gate
description: Gates sensitive tools behind GitHub Mobile push authentication

clientId.label: GitHub OAuth App Client ID
clientId.help: Create at GitHub Settings > Developer Settings > OAuth Apps (enable Device Flow)

tokenTtlMinutes.label: Session TTL (minutes)
tokenTtlMinutes.help: How long before re-authentication is required

sensitiveTools.label: Sensitive Tools
sensitiveTools.help: Tool names requiring 2FA (default: Bash, Write, Edit, NotebookEdit)

gateAllTools.label: Gate All Tools
gateAllTools.help: Require 2FA for all tools, not just sensitive ones
